body_html: Looks like in the first case you initialize with standard deviation of 0.1 (and truncate, but that's probably less important), and in the second case you use the default standard deviation of 1.0 in tf.random_normal_initializer. That's probably too high a deviaiton for your model. Try using the same initializer in the second case, i.e., change the last line to return tf.get_variable(name=name,shape=shape,initializer=tf.truncated_normal_initializer(stddev=0.1)). Hope that helps!
